alert.note: Alert for Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:07PM EST until February 21 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Central Ohio and West Central Ohio, including the following counties, in Central Ohio, Fairfield, Fayette OH, Franklin OH, Hocking, Licking, Madison and Pickaway. In West Central Ohio, Clark. * WHEN...Until 400 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 804 PM EST, radar showed that heavy rain was tapering off. However, areal flooding is still ongoing and is expected to continue into tonight. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Columbus, Springfield, Newark, Dublin, Lancaster, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Fairborn, Hilliard, Pickerington, Washington Court House, Worthington, Circleville, Bexley, Heath, London and Logan.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
